prod_short_desc: Blast the Resistance with the powerful turbolaser!
prod_long_desc:
Play out epic Star Wars battle scenes with the First Order Battle Pack. This set features a rotating First Order turbolaser turret with stud shooter and opening hatches that reveal weapon storage and control center to direct the fire. The set also includes 4 minifigures: 2 First Order Stormtroopers, First Order Technician and a First Order Crew, each with a stud blaster.
Includes 4 minifigures: 2 First Order Stormtroopers, First Order Technician and a First Order Crew.
Features a rotating turbolaser turret with stud shooter, and opening hatches that reveal weapons storage and a control center.
Flip open the hatches to access the control center and ammo storage.
Load the stud shooter and fire to repel Resistance attacks.
Includes 4 stud blasters and extra stud shooter ammo.
Accessory elements include a First Order Technician helmet and 2 First Order Stormtrooper helmets.
Makes a great addition to any LEGO® Star Wars collection.
Measures over 2” high, 2” wide and 1” long.
